## 2D UMAP Projection

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = x_2d, y = y_2d, color = averageRating)) +
  geom_point(size = 0.6, stroke = 0, alpha = 0.8) +
  # scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-4.7, 4.7)) +
  # scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-5.2, 4.7)) +
  # scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  scale_color_distiller(palette = "PRGn", breaks = seq(1, 10, 1)) +
  # guides(fill = guide_legend(
  #   override.aes = list(size = 2, alpha = 1, stroke = 0.8),
  #   theme = theme(legend.byrow = TRUE),
  #   nrow = 1
  # )) +
  labs(
    title = "2D UMAP Projection of IMDb Movie Embeddings",
    subtitle = "All movies with atleast 30 votes until 2025-02-16. Colors represent average rating.",
    caption = caption
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 5, margin = margin(c(0.05, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0), unit = "cm")),
    legend.key.width = unit(1.5, unit = "cm"),
    legend.key.height = unit(0.25, unit = "cm"),
    legend.margin = margin(c(0.0, 0.5, -0.2, 0.4), unit = "cm"),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
  )

ggsave("imdb_umap_rating.png", plot, width = 4, height = 4)
```
